data.text:
――Mejiro Ramonu was going to run. Many trainers 
and Uma Musume had gathered in the spectator 
seats to just get a glimpse. Among those――
data.processed:
<story>――Mejiro Ramonu was going to run. Many trainers 
<story>and Uma Musume had gathered in the spectator 
<story>seats to just get a glimpse. Among those――

data.text:
I'm really looking forward to Ramonu's mock race…… 
But, doesn't it seem like this was really sudden?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I'm really looking forward to Ramonu's mock race…… 
<story>But, doesn't it seem like this was really sudden?

data.text: That's just how she is.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>That's just how she is.

data.text:
This race had a sudden opening. While discussing 
what to do, she just said 『What's my gate number?』…… 
I heard it was a decision from higher up.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>This race had a sudden opening. While discussing 
<story>what to do, she just said 『What's my gate number?』…… 
<story>I heard it was a decision from higher up.

data.text: So that's how it is……so that's why those girls are like "that".
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>So that's how it is……so that's why those girls are like "that".

data.text: Uuuu, why is Ramonu-san……I hadn't heard about this!
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed: <story>Uuuu, why is Ramonu-san……I hadn't heard about this!

data.text:
Just her aura is scary……just when we had the chance to run 
in front of a bunch of people……it might be impossible.
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>Just her aura is scary……just when we had the chance to run 
<story>in front of a bunch of people……it might be impossible.

data.text:
It seemed like Mejiro Ramonu had an intimidating presence atop 
the turf. If it was like this, it wouldn't be a proper race……
data.processed:
<story>It seemed like Mejiro Ramonu had an intimidating presence atop 
<story>the turf. If it was like this, it wouldn't be a proper race……

data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>……――

data.text: How boring.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>How boring.

data.text: Eh……？
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed: <story>Eh……？

data.text:
I want to race. However……if it's like this, 
it'll just end up being one-sided.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>I want to race. However……if it's like this, 
<story>it'll just end up being one-sided.

data.text:
That can't be called a race…… 
Is there a single one of you that can keep me entertained?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>That can't be called a race…… 
<story>Is there a single one of you that can keep me entertained?

data.text: Hiii……!
data.name: Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>Hiii……!

data.text:
The Uma Musume were even more intimidated by Ramonu's 
provocative words…… However, from among them――
data.processed:
<story>The Uma Musume were even more intimidated by Ramonu's 
<story>provocative words…… However, from among them――

data.text:
……! Just saying whatever you want……! 
Fine, that arrogant attitude…… I'll crush you!
data.name: Uma Musume C
data.processed:
<story>……! Just saying whatever you want……! 
<story>Fine, that arrogant attitude…… I'll crush you!

data.text: ……Fufu. You're wonderful――
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>……Fufu. You're wonderful――

data.text:
Thus, with a heavy atmosphere, the mock race 
began…… From beginning to end, it ended up 
becoming a solo performance by Mejiro Ramonu……
data.processed:
<story>Thus, with a heavy atmosphere, the mock race 
<story>began…… From beginning to end, it ended up 
<story>becoming a solo performance by Mejiro Ramonu……

data.text: Huuu……!
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Huuu……!

data.text:
Mejiro Ramonu showed a beautiful example of a start dash. 
She took a good position to wait for her chance. And then――
data.processed:
<story>Mejiro Ramonu showed a beautiful example of a start dash. 
<story>She took a good position to wait for her chance. And then――

data.text: ――Right here.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>――Right here.

data.text: Huuu……!
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Huuu……!

data.text:
She timed it perfectly…… in an instant, she broke through. 
Nobody was able to keep up.
data.processed:
<story>She timed it perfectly…… in an instant, she broke through. 
<story>Nobody was able to keep up.

data.text:
Kuuu…… reach her……! 
I don't want to lose……! Aaaahhhhhh!
data.name: Uma Musume C
data.processed:
<story>Kuuu…… reach her……! 
<story>I don't want to lose……! Aaaahhhhhh!

data.text:
――Aahh……perfect. Yes, this is it…… 
Fufuu…… Ahahahaa……!!
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>――Aahh……perfect. Yes, this is it…… 
<story>Fufuu…… Ahahahaa……!!

data.text:
……all of those girls, they're all talented and aiming to debut soon. 
Even then……it's almost like they aren't even a challenge to her.
data.name: Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>……all of those girls, they're all talented and aiming to debut soon. 
<story>Even then……it's almost like they aren't even a challenge to her.

data.text:
Mejiro Ramonu…… so that's the new scion of the Mejiro family…… 
How perfect――and fearsome.
data.name: Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>Mejiro Ramonu…… so that's the new scion of the Mejiro family…… 
<story>How perfect――and fearsome.

data.text:
The noise of the crowd sounded far away, drowned out 
by the beating of my own heart…… just like that time――
data.processed:
<story>The noise of the crowd sounded far away, drowned out 
<story>by the beating of my own heart…… just like that time――

data.text:
――When Symboli Rudolf became an Undefeated Triple Crown 
Uma Musume…… No, even more so than any other race before.
data.processed:
<story>――When Symboli Rudolf became an Undefeated Triple Crown 
<story>Uma Musume…… No, even more so than any other race before.

data.text:
The first ever Triple Tiara……the only one capable of 
achieving that honor, it has to be Mejiro Ramonu……!
data.processed:
<story>The first ever Triple Tiara……the only one capable of 
<story>achieving that honor, it has to be Mejiro Ramonu……!

data.text: Huh? That person……
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Huh? That person……

data.text:
Yes. ……this time, I hope it goes well. 
No, I need it to go well or it'll be very troubling.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Yes. ……this time, I hope it goes well. 
<story>No, I need it to go well or it'll be very troubling.

data.text: Oh? Are you going to go support them?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Oh? Are you going to go support them?

data.text:
I'm just going to take a look. Whether I get involved or not, 
things will still end up going her way, after all……
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>I'm just going to take a look. Whether I get involved or not, 
<story>things will still end up going her way, after all……

data.text:
……they've known each other since way back, right? 
For some reason Rudolf seems……excited?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>……they've known each other since way back, right? 
<story>For some reason Rudolf seems……excited?

data.text:
I followed quickly after Mejiro Ramonu after 
she left the course and headed to the central 
plaza. She glanced at me as I ran towards her.
data.processed:
<story>I followed quickly after Mejiro Ramonu after 
<story>she left the course and headed to the central 
<story>plaza. She glanced at me as I ran towards her.

data.text: Sure.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Sure.

data.text: You're the first. So, it's decided.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>You're the first. So, it's decided.

data.text:
Will you escort me? 
――Through the Twinkle Series.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Will you escort me? 
<story>――Through the Twinkle Series.

data.text:
It took a few moments for her words to register. 
"I was offered a trainer contract"……once I 
understood what she was saying, there was only one answer.
data.processed:
<story>It took a few moments for her words to register. 
<story>"I was offered a trainer contract"……once I 
<story>understood what she was saying, there was only one answer.

data.text:
And so, even though it was so sudden…… 
I had become Mejiro Ramonu's trainer.
data.processed:
<story>And so, even though it was so sudden…… 
<story>I had become Mejiro Ramonu's trainer.

data.text:
――Huu…… Huu…… 
Huu……Fufuu.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>――Huu…… Huu…… 
<story>Huu……Fufuu.

data.text:
Satisfied……is how I could describe that look, Ramonu. 
Watching your dazzling run, has made my heart clear.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Satisfied……is how I could describe that look, Ramonu. 
<story>Watching your dazzling run, has made my heart clear.

data.text:
Thank you, Rudolf. If that isn't a lie, 
will you show me your true heart?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Thank you, Rudolf. If that isn't a lie, 
<story>will you show me your true heart?

data.text:
……I suppose my words were a bit exaggerated. While those 
words were true, there is certainly more to it than that.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>……I suppose my words were a bit exaggerated. While those 
<story>words were true, there is certainly more to it than that.

data.text:
I heard, you've decided on a trainer? 
Congratulations. And……welcome.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>I heard, you've decided on a trainer? 
<story>Congratulations. And……welcome.

data.text:
To me especially, this is something to be joyful 
about. With your entry, the racing world will 
continue to become even more sensational.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>To me especially, this is something to be joyful 
<story>about. With your entry, the racing world will 
<story>continue to become even more sensational.

data.text:
……between our Symboli family and the Mejiro family. 
The time to fulfill our long held promise is nearing. 
I've already achieved it……next, it's your turn, Ramonu.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>……between our Symboli family and the Mejiro family. 
<story>The time to fulfill our long held promise is nearing. 
<story>I've already achieved it……next, it's your turn, Ramonu.

data.text:
……so you're a person without charm, it seems. 
It's very unappealing, unfortunately.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>……so you're a person without charm, it seems. 
<story>It's very unappealing, unfortunately.

data.text:
Even if it's not put in to words, I understand 
what my duty is. Of course I'll achieve it. 
However, something like that isn't……my only theme.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Even if it's not put in to words, I understand 
<story>what my duty is. Of course I'll achieve it. 
<story>However, something like that isn't……my only theme.

data.text: ――I just want to love. That's all……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>――I just want to love. That's all……

data.text:
……right, that's just how you are. 
That your love might be fulfilled, I'll be praying for you.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>……right, that's just how you are. 
<story>That your love might be fulfilled, I'll be praying for you.

data.text:
……Fufuu…… Ahahaa…… yes, it's strange. 
Isn't that the point though, Loulou?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>……Fufuu…… Ahahaa…… yes, it's strange. 
<story>Isn't that the point though, Loulou?

data.text:
Just wishing for it to be fulfilled wouldn't be love. 
I just want to love, devotedly……boundlessly.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Just wishing for it to be fulfilled wouldn't be love. 
<story>I just want to love, devotedly……boundlessly.

data.text:
I apologize for being so distant. I'll try to figure out 
all the subtleties, so would you please stop treating me 
like a child? ……I'm looking forward to watching your races.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>I apologize for being so distant. I'll try to figure out 
<story>all the subtleties, so would you please stop treating me 
<story>like a child? ……I'm looking forward to watching your races.

data.text:
……No, I'll be the one to teach you. 
My love, will surpass your ideals……――
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>……No, I'll be the one to teach you. 
<story>My love, will surpass your ideals……――
